summary: This bill proposes to rename the Department of Veterans Affairs community-based outpatient clinic in San Jose, California, as the "Corporal Patrick D. Tillman VA Clinic." The bill includes findings detailing Pat Tillman's life, from his football career to his decision to join the U.S. Army after 9/11 and his death in Afghanistan. It cites Tillman's heroism and posthumous recognition and legally designates the new name for the clinic.
